Position: Salesforce Financial Service Cloud Developer

Experience: 5+ Years

Work Location: Remote

Notice Period: Immediate/ 15 days

 

Job Description:

 

We are seeking an experienced Salesforce FSC Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate should possess a minimum of 4+ years of Salesforce development experience with a strong focus on Financial Services Cloud (FSC).

 

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and customize Salesforce Financial Services Cloud solutions according to business requirements and best practices.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and understand functional requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
  • Design, develop, test, and deploy custom applications, features, and integrations on the Salesforce platform.
  • Implement Apex classes, triggers, Visualforce pages, and Lightning components to support business processes and enhance user experience.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth integration of Salesforce FSC with other systems and tools.
  • Perform data migration and data manipulation tasks using Apex Data Loader or other appropriate tools.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Salesforce configuration, customization, and integration.
  • Maintain up-to-date documentation of technical designs, configurations, and customizations.
  • Keep abreast of the latest Salesforce features, releases, and industry trends to provide recommendations for enhancements.
  • Collaborate with QA teams to ensure the quality of the developed solutions through testing and validation.
  • Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality, security, and performance.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers, as needed.
  • Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and best practices.

 

Qualifications and Skills:

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 4+ years of hands-on experience in Salesforce development.
  • Strong expertise in Salesforce Financial Services Cloud (FSC) is essential.
  • Proficiency in Salesforce technologies including Visualforce, Apex, S-controls, and Triggers.
  • Experience with integration tools and methodologies, REST/SOAP APIs, and web services.
  • Proven track record of delivering successful Salesforce projects on time and within scope.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex technical issues.
  • Effective communication skills, both verbal and written.
  • Salesforce Developer (401) or Admin (201) certification is required.
  • Salesforce Platform Developer (PD1) certification is a plus.
  • Experience with Lightning components and development is desirable.
  • Familiarity with agile development methodologies is preferred.
  • Financial industry knowledge is a bonus.
